data.event:
Johnny Smith is has developed a peanut allergy.

The patient has had no prior allergies reported prior to this incident but has since developed a severe reaction to peanuts and other legumes.

Claude Monet, also known as Oscar-Claude Monet or Claude Oscar Monet was born to Adolphe and Louise-Justine Monet of 45 Rue Laffitte, in the 9th arrondissement of Paris.

He was christened as Oscar-Claude at the church of Notre-Dame-de-Lorette. His father wanted him to go into the family (grocery store) business, but Claude Monet wanted to become an artist. His mother was a singer, both parents were second-generation Parisians.

Plan of Care for the next year

Get more exercise and don't eat peanuts.

Physical Checkup

The patient is in perfect health.

Epipen

Use in case of an allergy reaction after injesting peanuts.
